ValidationRule.description: Prevents Career Center users from editing "regular" Engagement Activities
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName='General_Engagement_Activity_Values', NOT($Permission.HAM_Engagement_Manager), OR( ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(HAM_Engagement_Activity_Value__c), ISCHANGED(HAM_Constituent__c), ISCHANGED(HAM_Activity_Type__c), ISCHANGED(HAM_Activity_Subtype__c), ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), ISCHANGED(HAM_Category__c), ISCHANGED(HAM_Role__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only edit Career Center activities
